constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non Material Amendment application of planning permission 22/01836/KPSID (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved Plans) and removal of Condition 5b (Construction Management Plan) of Planning Permission ref: 19/01813/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of Planning Permission 15/12978/FUL (Demolition of existing office and ancillary building. Erection of part 3 part 6 storey building for 2,478sqm floorspace for a two form entry primary school for a maximum of 420 pupils including provision of double basement for double height sports hall and provision of a raised play deck; and 19 flats (5 no. 1 bedroom flats; 10 no. 2 bedroom units; 4 no. 3 bedroom units). Provision of up to 94 cycle stands.) to amend drawings to allow for elevational treatment changes, and internal layout changes) dated 11/10/2019. Application to consist of removal of duplicate condition and changes to brickwork, elevations and canopies to ground floor school play area) to amend condition 1 (Approved Plans) to extend the sports netting/fencing at rooftop level on the school.
